subject: Coronavirus pandemic
title: Covid: Chelmsford beer and cider festivals cancelled
article: Two beer and cider festivals have been cancelled due to the Covid-19 pandemic, organisers have said. Members of theCamra Winter and Summer Chelmsford Beer and Cider Festivals said it was looking at "an alternative festival to take place later this year".The next event would depend on the "guidance given by the government", it added.It was last held in February 2020 at the city's Admirals Park.Find BBC News: East of England on Facebook , Instagram and Twitter .
